==Trivia==
* The Chinese name of the soundtrack, {{zh|殊胜之身|Shūshèng zhī Shēn}} is a reference to a line in one of [[Raiden Shogun]]'s [https://youtu.be/hQ5GEOlwLUQ Story Teasers], in which she says the line "Mine is the most supreme and noble form {{Lang|zh=此身即是最为殊胜尊贵之神}}".
* {{Transclude|Inazuma (Soundtrack)|InazumaLeitmotif|section=1}}
